column4: When I try to install the linuxant drivers for my modem I get this error: http://img47.exs.cx/my.php?loc=img47&image=ok5eu.png
Someone already told me that I should install the GCC and kernel header files... but they are already installed
someone already told me to get gcc and the kernel headers installed, but they already were
I also tried this while using the live cd... maybe that makes a diff?
it is looking for the kernel source, which is not there
is that because im running the live cd?
you would have to download that as well
what are you trying to install?
linuxant drivers for my 56k connexant modem
I have never used the linuxant drivers
you need build-essential and the linux kernel source for a minimum
can I use the symantic thing to get it from CD?
yes, but everything you do will be gone when the power is gone
